dialogue.introduction: My name is Izumo Ma... No, Hiyou. I'm an aircraft carrier. Pleased to meet you, Admiral!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Hiyou! Converted from the Northern line passenger liner 'Izumo-maru' into a carrier. But, I was able to operate at the same level as a full aircraft carrier. It's the truth!
dialogue.secretary1: What is it, jeez! Please quit fooling around on duty! Jeez...
dialogue.secretary2: Excellent timing, you can help with the aircraft maintenance. There's just so much to do...
dialogue.secretary3: Since you have so much free time, you can check the elevator's hydraulics. It's in bad shape...
dialogue.secretaryidle: I have not given up the San Francisco route. If there is peace... eventually, I'm sure...
dialogue.wedding: A-ah, somehow fleet work is tiring… Ah, sorry to be grumbling to Admiral… I-it's okay?... Why…?
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral, it is important to review the report. Here, the report♪
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Now then, Hiyou-class aircraft carrier's setting off!
dialogue.equipment1: Thank you very much! These are such wonderful equipment♪
dialogue.equipment2: Alright, with this I finally can fought along with the Standard Carriers~ Yay♪
dialogue.supply: What's that, what's that? Power-Up? How nice~
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I just don't have time to dock...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Head into the dock!? I'm so tired of that....
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The battle, it has been finished.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Now then, Hiyou-class aircraft carrier, setting off at full power! The flying corps are perfectly proficient!
dialogue.air_battle: Even if my armor is slightly thin~!
dialogue.night_battle: Now then, I'll take revenge for Midway!
dialogue.mvp: See? A remodeled carrier isn't weak, isn't it? We can do it!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Fire on the flight deck? Fire pumps, hurry!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: The fire pump failed...what do you mean....
dialogue.sunk: The blaze couldn't be...extinguished. I'll go on too...
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: I see, today is a special day. Junyou, you're already red... how much are you going to drink...?
dialogue.christmas_2015: I-is it Christmas? I wonder if my dress is still here... may I wear it, now?
